title: Amazon Essentials Men's Performance Tech Loose-Fit Shorts (Available in Big & Tall), Pack of 2
description: RELAXED FIT: Our most generous shorts fit, relaxed through the hip, thigh, and leg. Sits below the waist.

PERFORMANCE TECH FABRIC: An ultra-lightweight and breathable fabric, with a soft finish. Made with quick dry and moisture-wicking finishes, helping you stay comfortable and cool while you workout. This honeycomb texture knit fabric has a 4 way gentle stretch for full flexibility during wear.

BASKETBALL SHORTS: Mix and match your wardrobe with these effortless shorts, perfect for the studio or everyday comfort. These shorts are designed to sit just above the knee. Whether you're heading out for a jog, a quick game of basketball or running errands with the kids, our apparel is made to work out, live in, and lounge.
DETAILS: Featuring an adjustable elasticated waistband with drawcord , for additional security during workouts.
INSEAM LENGTH: 8" on US size M
We listen to customer feedback and fine-tune every detail to ensure our clothes are more comfortable, higher quality, and longer lasting—at affordable prices for the whole family.
